resources.string:
About auto extension detection:
Auto extension detection uses file signatures to detect file types.
File signatures was taken from:
	1. www.garykessler.net/library/file_sigs.html
	2. www.filesignatures.net
	3. www.researchgate.net/figure/225793510_fig1_Fig-1-AVI-file-header
	4. https://wangrui.wordpress.com/2007/06/19/file-signatures-table

Disclaimer:
This program is made for fun and educational purpose only.
The program was not made for privacy violation.
The author of the program will not have any responsibility if any privacy violation or such thing happens using this program.
If you are here to decrypt files that is not yours then close the program now.

User Limitation:
This is an open-source and free program.
You may have a copy of source code at https://github.com/rafiibrahim8/Vault-Blaster
You are allowed to reproduce and/or redistribute the program with this license included without erasing anything.
I agree the terms and conditions above.
